snippet.title: First look at Chuhou Joutai - A Retro Danmaku Game
snippet.description:
Chuhou Joutai was created by a 19-year-old programmer named Susumu Takajima, an amateur graphic designer, programmer, and composer currently studying Communications at Mercyhurst University in Erie, Pennsylvania.

The ideas for the game actually came from his experiences of growing up in the city. It's time to pass retro gaming onto a new generation of players. I also want the danmaku genre to open up to a wider audience of players, the first danmaku game that everyone will play.

#ChuhouJoutai

Download the demo:
https://drillimation.itch.io/chuhou-joutai

For too long, a dangerous left-wing terrorist organization named the Shintoist Province and Scarlet Devil of Team Crimson (often abbreviated as SPASDOT) has been trying to overthrow the monarchy of Kozan and has entered a period of civil war. Legends say you must defeat its leader in order to restore peace to Kozan.

Visit our website: https://drillimation.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Drillimation1
Instagram: https://instagram.com/drillimation.official
Discord: https://discord.gg/WU5Afch
